ValidationRule.description: Timesheet Entry End must be less than or equal to Timesheet Pay Period End.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF ( and ( DATEVALUE(End__c) <> null, Timesheet__r.Pay_Period_End__c <> null, DATEVALUE(End__c) > Timesheet__r.Pay_Period_End__c ) , true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The End must be less than or equal to the Timesheet Pay Period End.
